files.patch:
@@ -1045,1 +1045,3 @@
-                Float.intBitsToFloat(0x7f80_0000 | // Preserve NaN signif bits
+                Float.intBitsToFloat((bin16SignBit << 16) |
+                                     0x7f80_0000 |
+                                     // Preserve NaN signif bits
@@ -1091,1 +1093,1 @@
-        short sign_bit = (short)((doppel >> 16) & 0x8000);
+        short sign_bit = (short)((doppel & 0x8000_0000) >> 16);
